name: Fiscal Kombat
storyline: Jean-Luc Mélenchon shakes the "oligarchs" one by one, from Jérôme Cahuzac to Christine Lagarde, including Nicolas Sarkozy, Emmanuel Macron, Pierre Gattaz, Patrick Balkany, Liliane Bettencourt and François Fillon, so that they "give back the money".
summary: A beat 'em up, flash game featuring the political candidate of the 2017 French Election Jean-Luc Mélenchon.
